content.title: Netaji Subhas - ICAR International Fellowship
content.department: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
content.beneficiary: Indian and Overseas nationals pursuing doctoral degrees in agriculture and allied sciences
content.details: Netaji Subhas - ICAR International Fellowship (NS-ICAR IF) is a Fellowship Scheme by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR), Department of Agricultural Research and Education (DARE), Ministry of Agriculture & Farmers Welfare. The objective is to develop competent human resource that are trained in the identified best laboratories in the world (for Indian candidates) and similarly expose overseas candidates to the best Indian Agricultural Universities (AUs) in the ICAR-AU system for creating a pool of scientist-envoys for enhanced future co-operation.
benefits: To-and-fro, economy class air ticket for international travel.
Economy-class-travel cost reimbursement for overseas fellows.
Monthly fellowship amount for Indian and overseas fellows.
Lump-sum payments towards contingent and preparatory expenses.
eligibility: Masterâ€™s degree in agriculture/allied sciences with an Overall Grade Point Average (OGPA) 6.60 out of 10.0 or 65% marks or equivalent.
Fresh candidates should not be more than 35 years of age; upper age limit for in-service candidates is 40 years.
Fresh candidates should have completed their qualifying degree not more than two years before the specified date in the year of admission.
content.application_process: Online application through announcements published in Indian national newspapers and the notification on ICAR website.
documents_required: Passing Certificate / Marksheet of the Latest Educational Qualification
No-Objection Certificate from the Employer (if employed)
Details of the Ph.D. Degree Programme applied for
Certificate of Proficiency in English (for overseas applicants)
Details of the Aadhaar Linked Bank Account

faqs.question: What Documents Are Required While Filling The Online Application?
faqs.answer: Required Document while submitting the online application: Photo, Signature, documents of education qualification, proof of experience, proof of achievements, proof of publications.

faqs.question: What Is The Mode Of Application?
faqs.answer: The Form Will Be Submitted Online.
